CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

The three materials mentioned in the paragraph are PIDT-C12NT, PIDT - EHNT, and PIDT - DTNT.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |

After reevaluating the paragraph, only PIDT-C12NT is a clear material name. The other two, PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT, are not explicitly mentioned as material names in the paragraph.
